posts.post_title: WTB: T207 Cicotte Napoleon Little Cigars
posts.post_content:
Looking for a T207 Cicotte with the Napoleon Little Cigars back. The last back I need to complete my back run. Please PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with what you may have available.

Thanks!
